body_html:
I got it working
TensorFlow version: v1.8.0
Ubuntu 18.04
CUDA 9.0
cuDNN 7.1 for CUDA 9.0
GCC 4.8

I solved this problem by downgrading to GCC 4.8. (GCC 6 had worked previously, but not with TF1.8)
sudo apt-get install gcc-4.8
sudo update-alternatives install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-4.8

TensorFlow version: v1.8.0
Ubuntu 18.04
CUDA 9.0
cuDNN 7.1 for CUDA 9.0
GCC 4.8
I solved this problem by downgrading to GCC 4.8. (GCC 6 had worked previously, but not with TF1.8)
sudo apt-get install gcc-4.8
sudo update-alternatives install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-4.8
body:
I got it working
TensorFlow version: v1.8.0
Ubuntu 18.04
CUDA 9.0
cuDNN 7.1 for CUDA 9.0
GCC 4.8

I solved this problem by downgrading to GCC 4.8. (GCC 6 had worked previously, but not with TF1.8)
`sudo apt-get install gcc-4.8`
`sudo update-alternatives install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-4.8`
